name: ManoperationAR
description:
ManoperationAR is a game inspired by the Operation board where you use hands to perform surgery on a patient. Scan the room, place down the board by tapping your screen, move infront of the board and bring out your hand in view of the camera. Move your hand further or closer to the camera. Try not to hit the edge of the board!

Best played standing up with enough room to move around!

All assets were made from scratch except the cartoon person image on the boardgame.

Video: https://youtu.be/df8b9TCPLhI

Music: https://www.bensound.com
